thread.title: Nancy Jones, M.P.H.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Nancy Jones, M.P.H.

author: Nancy Jones, M.P.H.
title: Nancy Jones, M.P.H.
text: This is an excellent water shower filter system to remove harmful chemicals from the water before they hit and get absorbed into your skin. We are bombarded with numerous chemical from the air/water/food. Why not limit the chemicals via the water system? Although our water supply may show a great annual report, one is still getting chemicals through the system. If oncologist are telling people to add a filter to their drinking water, doesn't it make sense to add a filter to your shower? If you just take the time to do the research, you also will purchase a water shower filter system. A reasonable cost for an enormous benefit.
